about_the_game:
Rutie was previously known as the Warden Witch: a powerful Witch tasked with imprisoning and guarding all the world's evils. One day she overslept and one of the greatest evils, Azazoth, managed to escape and lay waste to the world in her absence! He was promptly recaptured by the other Witches, but not before leaving behind pieces of himself - dubbed Remnants by the High Coven - to continue to wreak havoc while he's imprisoned. Stripped of her title and demoted to the much weaker position of Duskwitch, Rutie is now forced to clean up after her mistakes and eliminate all the Remnants! Dodge, shoot and style your way through the apocalypse in this fast paced character action shooter hybrid!

KEY FEATURES



Stylish Witch Combat
Fight your way through the end of the world and clean up in style with your Broom (that is also a gun)!


Style Switching System
The Heroic Souls Rutie meets along her journey unlock new fighting styles and bullet types for her to use!


Fast Paced Magical Girl Action
Switching styles allows Rutie to pull off incredible combos where the only limit is your imagination and how fast you can press those buttons!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-9700 CPU @3.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: Duskwitch: Heroic Soul is a fast-paced character action shooter where you play as Rutie, a Witch that is tasked with saving the world after nearly ending it herself. Harness the power of the Broom and style your way through the apocalypse as the Duskwitch!
